tasks.instructions: You should spend about 40 minutes on this task
tasks.topic: Some people think that physical strength is important for success in sport, while other people think that mental strength is more important. Discuss both views and give your own opinion.
requirements: Give reasons for your answer and include any relevant examples from your own knowledge or experience.
